Secretary General of IMO Here
    Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Efthimios E. Mitropoulos, secretary general of the International Maritime Organization (IMO), arrived here Saturday.
 He was greeted at the airport by Jon Ki Chol, deputy director of the State Bureau of Maritime Supervision.    
 The DPRK government arranged a reception in honour of the general secretary in the evening.

DPRK Delegations Leave
    Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of People's Security led by Minister Ju Sang Song left here today by air to visit Russia. A delegation of the Ministry of Electricity and Coal Industries headed by Minister Ju Tong Il flew here today to visit China.
 They were seen off at the airport by Ji Yong Chun, director of the Political Department of the Ministry of People's Security, Sin Il Nam, vice-minister of People's Security, Sin Yong Song, vice-minister of Electricity and Coal Industries, officials concerned, Andrei Karlov, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and Guan Huabing, charge d' affaires ad interim of China here.
